text:
🏵️An interesting feature at the Therapeutic Garden at Bedok Reservoir is the Interactive Rock Garden.
🌷By carefully balancing rocks on top of each other, it promotes concentration, focus and patience.
🌺This fun activity is immersive and meditative.
🌿Other features in the Garden includes a grass covered Activity Lawn where one can meditate or do Yoga in a lush surrounding.
🌻There is a Physiotherapy Mound for some strength training for seniors to enhance their mobility, increase stamina and improve balance.
🪻The Water Feature is a refreshing feature not found in many other Therapeutic Gardens.
🍁Therapeutic Garden is conveniently located near the public toilet and Carpark B.
Small lovely garden. Indeed rather therapeutic with the stone stacking and appropriate plants to create the peaceful vibes in the garden
This garden was built not long ago , though small really make the whole reservoir soothing when walking around .

The stone balancing activity is fun. There’s a shelter inside the therapeutic garden in case it rains. The toilet is located conveniently opposite the therapeutic garden as well. Managed to sight some hummingbirds ! Lucky me!
peaceful place really a therapeutic moment to be in this park
